description: Try our easy to follow Mediterranean Potato Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Potato salad,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mediterranean Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Pour over just enough cold water to cover the potatoes in a saucepan and add the saffron. Bring to the boil, then cover and simmer very gently for 15 minutes until tender and cooked through. Drain and leave to cool.
Put the sunblush tomatoes, olives, oil, chia seeds, basil leaves and capers in a large bowl, add the cooled potatoes and gently toss together. Season with a little salt and plenty of pepper.
Divide the salad between 4 serving bowls and serve with fresh crusty bread or a simple rocket salad if liked.
